name: Questing Knight
text: You have sworn a sacred vow to pursue a great quest that has challenged the devotion of divine champions for centuries.

features.questingKnightResoluteAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also make a saving throw with a +2 bonus
features.truthSense(11thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to Will against charm, fear, and illusion effects and a +2 bonus to Insight checks
features.knight'sResurgence(16thLevel): While you are bloodied, you can use your second wind as a free action on your turn

flavorText: I measure my worth by that which I seek.
